thread.title: Tesla books record loss in race to mass market

title: Tesla books record loss in race to mass market
text:
Tesla books record loss in race to mass market 6:34pm EDT - 02:03
Tesla may have posted its worst quarterly loss ever on Wednesday, but it’s staying on track with Model 3 production targets is giving investors a bit of relief. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Tesla may have posted its worst quarterly loss ever on Wednesday, but it’s staying on track with Model 3 production targets is giving investors a bit of relief. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Kz7eay
